BestPracticeList.description: The response of the list best practice operation.

value.description: Result of the list best practice operation.

ConfigurationProfileList.description: The response of the list configuration profile operation.

value.description: Result of the list ConfigurationProfile operation.

BestPractice.description: Definition of the Automanage best practice.

id.description: The fully qualified ID for the best practice.  For example, /providers/Microsoft.Automanage/bestPractices/azureBestPracticesProduction

type.description: The type of the resource.  For example, Microsoft.Automanage/bestPractices

name.description: The name of the best practice. For example, azureBestPracticesProduction

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.
Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

configuration.title: configuration
configuration.description: configuration dictionary of the configuration profile.

ConfigurationDictionary.description: The custom configuration for configuration profile. Name and value pairs that define the configuration details of the configuration profile.

Overrides.description: The custom overrides for configuration profile

ConfigurationProfileAssignmentList.description: The response of the list configuration profile assignment operation.

value.description: Result of the list configuration profile assignment operation.

ConfigurationProfileAssignment.description: Configuration profile assignment is an association between a VM and automanage profile configuration.

properties.description: Properties of the configuration profile assignment.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

configurationProfile.description: The Automanage configurationProfile ARM Resource URI.

status.description: The status of onboarding, which only appears in the response.

profileOverrides.description: The profileOverrides setting for the configuration profile assignment.

ConfigurationProfileAssignmentProfileOve.description: Data related to configuration profile assignment profile overrides.

ReportList.description: The response of the list report operation.

value.description: Result of the list report operation.

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

AssignmentReportProperties.description: Data related to the report detail.

startTime.description: Start time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

endTime.description: End time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

lastModifiedTime.description: Last modified time of the configuration profile assignment processing.

duration.description: Duration of the configuration profile assignment processing.

type.description: Type of the configuration profile assignment processing (Initial/Consistency).

status.description: The status of the configuration profile assignment.

configurationProfile.description: The configurationProfile linked to the assignment.

resources.description: List of resources processed by the configuration profile assignment.

error.description: Error message, if any, returned by the configuration profile assignment processing.

ReportResource.description: Details about the resource processed by the configuration profile assignment

error.description: Error message, if any, returned when deploying the resource.

ServicePrincipal.description: The Service Principal Id for the subscription.

properties.title: Properties
properties.description: The Service Principal properties for the subscription

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

ServicePrincipalProperties.description: The Service Principal properties for the subscription.

servicePrincipalId.description: The Service Principal Id for the subscription.

authorizationSet.description: Returns the contributor RBAC Role exist or not for the Service Principal Id.

PatchTierList.description: The response of the list patch tier operation.

value.description: Result of the list PatchTier operation.

PatchTier.description: Describes the configuration of the PatchTier.

PatchTierUpdate.description: Describes the configuration of the PatchTier.

PatchJobConfigurationsUpdate.description: Describes the configuration of the PatchJobConfigurations.

PatchTierProperties.description: Describes the configuration of a PatchTier.

preTierScript.title: PreTierScript
preTierScript.description: Script to run before tier execution.

postTierScript.title: PostTierScript
postTierScript.description: Script to run after tier execution.

preVmScript.title: PreVmScript
preVmScript.description: Script to run before machine execution.

postVmScript.title: PostVmScript
postVmScript.description: Script to after before machine execution.

runbookResourceId.description: Resource Id of designated arc machine.

runOn.description: Resource Id of designated virtual machine.

MachineSelection.description: The result of the preliminary checks before execution of the workflow can begin.

arcScopes.description: List of scopes from which to include arc machines

vmScopes.description: List of scopes from which to include virtual machines

includeTags.title: configuration
includeTags.description: tag dictionary for Tag-based inclusion selection.

excludeTags.title: configuration
excludeTags.description: tag dictionary for Tag-based exclusion selection.

sequentialMachineGroups.description: List of machines for static selection.

TagDictionary.description: Name and value pairs that define the tag based machine selection criteria.

ScriptDictionary.description: Name and value pairs that define script parameters.

SequentialMachines.description: List of machines for static selection.

parallelMachines.description: List of machines for static selection.

arcMachineId.description: Resource Id of designated arc machine.

virtualMachineId.description: Resource Id of designated virtual machine.

PatchJobConfigurations.description: Describes the configuration of the PatchJobConfigurations.

PatchJobConfigurationsProperties.description: Describes the configuration of a PatchTier.

preJobScript.title: PreJobScript
preJobScript.description: Script to run before job execution.

postJobScript.title: PostJobScript
postJobScript.description: Script to run after job execution.

sequentialPatchTierGroups.description: List of tier to run in sequence.

SequentialPatchTierGroups.description: List of tier to run in sequence

parallelPatchTiers.description: List of tier to run in sequence.

maximumDuration.description: Specifies the maximum amount of time that the operation will run. It must be an ISO 8601-compliant duration string such as PT4H (4 hours)

rebootSettings.description: Defines when it is acceptable to reboot a VM during a software update operation.

PatchSettingsDictionary.description: Name and value pairs that define the tag based machine selection criteria.

classificationsToInclude.description: List of categories/classifications to be used for selecting the updates to be installed on the machine. Acceptable values are: Critical, Security, UpdateRollUp, FeaturePack, ServicePack, Definition, Tools, Update

excludeKbsRequiringReboot.description: Filters out Kbs that don't have an InstallationRebootBehavior of 'NeverReboots' when this is set to true.

kbNumbersToInclude.description: List of Windows Update KB Ids that should be installed. All updates belonging to the classifications provided in classificationsToInclude list will be installed. kbNumbersToInclude is an optional list of specific KBs to be installed in addition to the classifications. For example: 1234

kbNumbersToExclude.description: List of Windows Update KB Ids that should not be installed. This parameter overrides windowsParameters - classificationsToInclude, meaning a Windows Update KB Id specified here will not be installed even if it belongs to the classification provided under classificationsToInclude parameter.

maxPatchPublishDate.description: This is used to install patches that were published on or before this given max published date.

classificationsToInclude.description: The update classifications to select when installing patches for Linux

maintenanceRunId.description: This is used as a maintenance run identifier for Auto VM Guest Patching in Linux.

packageNameMasksToInclude.description: Packages to include in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

packageNameMasksToExclude.description: Packages to exclude in the patch operation. Format: packageName_packageVersion

PatchJob.description: Log the output of a patch job.

PatchJobProperties.description: Properties of the output of a patch job.

startTime.description: Start time of the patch job.

endTime.description: End time of the patch job.

PatchTierReportsDictionary.description: ResourceId of the PatchTier and a value reporting the patch result.

PatchJobConfigurationsList.description: The response of the list patch job configuration operation.

value.description: Result of the list PatchJobConfigurations operation.

PatchJobList.description: The response of the list patch jobs operation.

value.description: Result of the list PatchJob operation.

VmNameParameter.name: vmName
VmNameParameter.description: The name of the virtual machine.
